```{r}
# http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9620155/how-to-read-a-csv-file-containing-apostrophes-into-r
csvfileName <- 'amcc.csv'
username <- 
  Sys.info()['user']
pathToFile <-
  paste0('C:/Users/', username,'/Desktop/pathToCSV/')
setwd(pathToFile)
fileName <-
  'defaultPath.csv'
buf <-
  read.csv(file = fileName,header = F,skip = 0,
           stringsAsFactor = F,check.names = F,fileEncoding = 'utf-8')
pathOutputTOcsv <-
  paste0("C:/Users/", username, buf[2,1],'csv/')
setwd(pathOutputTOcsv)
tmp <-
  read.table(file = "clipboard",header = T,sep = "\t",stringsAsFactor = F,
             na.strings = c("na",""),check.names = F, quote="\"")
getwd()
write.csv(x = tmp,file = csvfileName,
          quote = F,row.names = F,append = F,fileEncoding = 'utf8')
```
